email.subject: Success is Assured
email.body:
Excellent work, operative. I have just received word that Gideon Mahler has been apprehended and is now in Nova's custody. We will make sure that traitor gets the punishment he deserves. You have done a great service to us, #PLAYERNAME#. Nova thanks you. This country thanks you. Get some rest, operative. You've earned it. I look forward to working with you in the future.
- Director Hilda Riegan
